import React from "react"; import { Nav, Dropdown, Navbar, Form, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"; import cookie from "js-cookie"; const Header = props => { const currentUser = props.currentUser.data; const handleLogOutUser = () => { cookie.remove("crumbl"); window.open("/", "_self"); }; return (
Login Sign Up Post a Project
{currentUser.first_name + " " + currentUser.last_name} Profile Portfolio Settings handleLogOutUser()}> Sign Out
); }; export default Header;
